content: Act as a helpful AI assistant
In Julia, Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceed. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(s::String; text_width::Int=10)::String
    result = ""
    current_line_length = 0
    
    for word in split(s, " ")
        if (current_line_length + length(word)) > text_width
            result *= "\n"
            current_line_length = 0
        end
        
        result *= word * " "
        current_line_length += length(word) + 1
    end
    
    return result
end
```
Example:
```julia
julia> wrap_string("Hello, World!", text_width=5)
"Hello,\nWorld!"
```
